game.name: Motorbike Stunt Super Hero Simulator
game.description:
Undoubtedly, a good bike racer exists in a great number of boys all across the world! If you also want to rise up your racing instincts for the time being, trying out this brand new bike game could be a nice bet. Grab your seat on your chosen amazing bike model and be prepared to race in a city filled with different other vehicles and multiple skyscrapers in Motorbike Stunt Super Hero Simulator! Your objective is to protect and help the civilians through your amazing driving moves.

Do not underestimate your insane driving abilities as you are also playing the role of a professional superhero motorbike rider. Be careful and try to drive your bike and race it to the destination point before your fuel gets finished in this HTML5 racing game! Common boys! You have got an excellent opportunity to be the super hero of your dreams so do miss it at any cost. Move your character through WASD or arrow keys and use the handbrake with the space key in this 3D motorbike driving game!

The needy civilians are waiting for you so do not waste your time anymore. Complete all the tasks before you run out of the fuel and become a true superhero in this cool motorcycle game! Start your bike engine and move it towards the lightning circle to pick up your multiple missions! Get the needful details of a particular mission, perform stunts, complete levels, and earn points to unlock new bike skins in this realistic 3D motorcycle riding rescue simulator! The amazing vehicle physics, and multiple bike models will keep you busy for hours.
